TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 505
TEI.2.document_title: Jose M J Carbajal to Stephen F Austin, 10-08-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: José M. J. Carbajal to Austin, San Antonio, October 8, 1830. Warning Austin that George Fisher is writing injurious reports concerning Austin to the political chief. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 505

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José M. J. Carbajal to Austin, San Antonio, October 8, 1830. Warning Austin that George Fisher is writing injurious reports concerning Austin to the political chief. (Omitted.) */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Antonio*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="10-08-1830">8 de Octbre de 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
